text: Hey team, looking to work with Morgan Morris for Target. Budget is approx $7,149 - need 1 x Product launch event, 2 x Live stream, 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Facebook post, 3 x 10-minute unboxing. 6 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: December 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
